name: FRATERNAL GOVERNMENT RELATIONS COALITION
description: Informal coalition of PanHellenic and Fraternal organizations
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to the reauthorization of the Higher Education Act, including the PROSPER Act (H.R. 4508).
Issues related to the reauthorization of the Higher Education Act, including the PROSPER Act (H.R. 4508) and the Aim Higher Act (H.R. 6543).
Issues related to the Higher Education Act reauthorization. Collegiate Freedom of Association Act (H.R. 3128). REACH Act (H.R. 662/S.706). END ALL Hazing Act (H.R. 3267).

Issues related to freedom of association and anti-hazing in the College Affordability Act (H.R. 4674). Collegiate Freedom of Association Act (H.R. 3128). REACH Act (H.R. 662/S.706). END ALL Hazing Act (H.R. 3267/S. 2711). Designation of volunteer advisors as campus security authorities and mandatory reporters.

Issues related to freedom of association and anti-hazing in the College Affordability Act (H.R. 4674). Collegiate Freedom of Association Act (H.R. 3128). REACH Act (H.R. 662/S.706). END ALL Hazing Act (H.R. 3267/S. 2711). Federal response to the COVID-19 virus, including relief for non-profit organizations under the CARES Act (S. 3458/H.R. 748).

Issues related to freedom of association and anti-hazing in the College Affordability Act (H.R. 4674). Collegiate Freedom of Association Act 2.0 (H.R. 6236). REACH Act (H.R. 662/S.706). END ALL Hazing Act (H.R. 3267/S. 2711). Federal response to the COVID-19 virus, including relief for non-profit organizations under the CARES Act (S. 3458/H.R. 748). Liability protections within higher education.
Collegiate Housing and Infrastructure Act (H.R. 7166).

Issues related to freedom of association and anti-hazing in the College Affordability Act (H.R. 4674). Collegiate Freedom of Association Act 2.0 (H.R. 6236). REACH Act (H.R. 662/S.706). END ALL Hazing Act (H.R. 3267/S. 2711). Federal response to the COVID-19 virus, including relief for non-profit organizations and liability protections within higher education under the CARES Act (S. 3458/H.R. 748), the HEROES Act (H.R. 6800), the HEALS Act (S. 1624), and Delivering Immediate Relief to Americas Families, Schools and Small Businesses Act (S. 178).

Issues related to freedom of association and anti-hazing in the College Affordability Act (H.R. 4674). Collegiate Freedom of Association Act 2.0 (H.R. 6236). REACH Act (H.R. 662/S.706). END ALL Hazing Act (H.R. 3267/S. 2711). Federal response to the COVID-19 virus, including relief for non-profit organizations and liability protections within higher education under the CARES Act (P.L. 116-136), HEROES Act (H.R. 6800), SAFE TO WORK Act (S. 4317), Continuing Small Business Recovery and Paycheck Protection Program Act (S. 4321), and Delivering Immediate Relief to Americas Families, Schools and Small Businesses Act (S. 4775).

Issues related to freedom of association and anti-hazing in the College Affordability Act (H.R. 4674). Collegiate Freedom of Association Act 2.0 (H.R. 6236). REACH Act (H.R. 662/S.706). END ALL Hazing Act (H.R. 3267/S. 2711). Federal response to the COVID-19 virus, including relief for non-profit organizations and liability protections within higher education under the CARES Act (P.L. 116-136), HEROES Act (H.R. 6800), SAFE TO WORK Act (S. 4317), Continuing Small Business Recovery and Paycheck Protection Program Act (S. 4321), Delivering Immediate Relief to Americas Families, Schools and Small Businesses Act (S. 4775), RESTART Act (H.R. 7481/S. 3814), and Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2021 (H.R. 133).
Tax issues related to non-profit student housing providers.
Issues related to non-profit eligibility for the Paycheck Protection Program, including implementation of the American Rescue Plan (P.L. 117-2).

Issues related to anti-hazing initiatives, including support for the REACH Act (H.R. 1932/S.744) and END ALL Hazing Act (H.R. 1933/S.775). Issues related to freedom of association for members of single-sex student organizations.

Issues related to anti-hazing initiatives, including support for the REACH Act (H.R. 2525/S. 744) and END ALL Hazing Act (H.R. 1933/S. 775). Issues related to freedom of association for members of single-sex student organizations.
Tax issues related to non-profit student housing providers, including support for the Collegiate Housing and Infrastructure Act of 2021 (H.R. 2421)
Tax issues related to non-profit student housing providers, including support for the Collegiate Housing and Infrastructure Act of 2021 (H.R. 2421/S. 2653).

Issues related to anti-hazing initiatives, including support for the REACH Act (H.R. 2525/S. 744) and END ALL Hazing Act (H.R. 1933/S. 775). Issues related to freedom of association for members of single-sex student organizations, including support for Collegiate Freedom of Association Act (H.R.6978).

Issues related to anti-hazing initiatives, including support for the REACH Act (H.R. 2525/S. 744) and END ALL Hazing Act (H.R. 1933/S. 775). Issues related to freedom of association for members of single-sex student organizations, including support for Collegiate Freedom of Association Act (H.R. 6978) and Freedom of Association in Higher Education Act of 2022 (H.R. 7488).

Issues related to anti-hazing legislation, including support for the Stop Campus Hazing Act (H.R. 5646/S. 2901) and a resolution related to the designation of a National Hazing Awareness Week" (H.Res. 717/S.Res. 360). Issues related to freedom of association for members of collegiate student organizations, including support for Collegiate Freedom of Association Act (H.R. 1626), Freedom of Association in Higher Education Act (H.R. 2451), and freedom of association provisions in the Respecting the First Amendment on Campus Act (H.R. 7683).
Tax issues related to non-profit student housing providers, including the Collegiate Housing and Infrastructure Act (H.R. 2662/S. 1420).
